song_name.description: Name of the song to play

function.name: playback_control
function.description: Control music playback (play, pause, skip, previous, stop)

function.name: create_playlist
function.description: Create a new playlist

function.name: add_to_playlist
function.description: Add song(s) to an existing playlist

song_name.description: Song to add

function.name: search_music
function.description: Search for songs, artists, albums, or playlists

type.description: Type of content to search for

genre.description: Filter by genre (optional)

function.name: add_to_favorites
function.description: Add current or specified song to favorites/liked songs

song_name.description: Song name (uses current song if not specified)

function.name: set_volume
function.description: Adjust volume level

function.name: shuffle_toggle
function.description: Toggle shuffle mode on or off

state.description: True for on, False for off, null to toggle

function.name: repeat_mode
function.description: Set repeat/loop mode

mode.description: Repeat mode: off, repeat one song, or repeat all

function.name: play_genre
function.description: Play music from a specific genre

genre.description: Music genre (rock, pop, jazz, classical, etc.)

function.name: set_sleep_timer
function.description: Set timer to stop music after specified duration

function.name: play_artist_radio
function.description: Play radio station based on artist or song

artist.description: Artist name to base radio on

song.description: Song name to base radio on (alternative)

function.name: download_for_offline
function.description: Download song, album, or playlist for offline listening

function.name: show_lyrics
function.description: Display lyrics for current or specified song

song_name.description: Song name (uses current song if not specified)

function.name: share_song
function.description: Share current or specified song

song_name.description: Song to share

function.name: adjust_equalizer
function.description: Adjust audio equalizer settings

function.name: queue_song
function.description: Add song to play queue

song_name.description: Song to add to queue

function.name: get_song_info
function.description: Get information about current or specified song

song_name.description: Song name (uses current song if not specified)

messages.content: You are a music application assistant that can control playback, manage playlists, search music, and help users enjoy their music experience.
